solution_line_template: John will give {total_winnings}/{fraction_given_divisor} = $<<{total_winnings}/{fraction_given_divisor}={amount_per_student}>>{amount_per_student} to each student.
For the hundred students, he will give: ${amount_per_student} * {num_students} = $<<{amount_per_student}*{num_students}={total_amount_received}>>{total_amount_received}
